message: My friend will be leaving the country soon so she will not be able to start up her lease at the WAHU student apts near the U of MN and is looking for someone to take her place. There are 3 other female roommates. It’s on the 11th floor. You get your own bathroom and bedroom. The cost is $875 per month all inclusive (internet, utilities, etc). The apt is furnished with a bed and desk as well as a washer and dryer. Other things available within the apt building are a gym, swimming pool, hot tub, free printing, and great gathering places both indoors and out. Please pm me if you are interested.
